\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
Primary class for computing persistent Laplacians 
\begin{DoxyTemplParams}{Template Parameters}
{\em eigs\+\_\+\+Algorithm} & Algorithm wrapper class to use for computing eigenvalues of the Laplacian in the spectra family of functions. Default is a wrapper for Eigen\+::\+Self\+Adjoint\+Eigen\+Solver. \\
\hline
{\em up\+\_\+\+Algorithm} & Algorithm wrapper class to use for computing the up-\/\+Laplacian. Default is the Schur complement algorithm presented in Memoli, Wan, and Wang 2020. //\+TODO\+: \textbackslash{}see up\+\_\+algorithms and eigs\+\_\+algorithms \\
\hline
\end{DoxyTemplParams}

{\footnotesize\ttfamily petls\+::\+Persistent\+Sheaf\+Laplacian\+::\+Persistent\+Sheaf\+Laplacian (\begin{DoxyParamCaption}\item[{std\+::vector$<$ Eigen\+::\+Sparse\+Matrix$<$ storage $>$$>$}]{boundaries,  }\item[{std\+::vector$<$ std\+::vector$<$ \mbox{\hyperlink{typedefs_8hpp_afc86493f3736a9d186d249149b2e5e22}{filtration\+\_\+type}} $>$$>$}]{filtrations }\end{DoxyParamCaption})\hspace{0.3cm}{\ttfamily [inline]}}


\begin{DoxyParams}{Parameters}
{\em boundaries} & a vector of Eigen\+::\+Sparse\+Matrix of type float. Boundaries must be sorted in order of dimension. \\
\hline
{\em filtrations} & a vector of vector of filtrations. filtrations\mbox{[}dim\mbox{]} is a list of all filtrations of simplices in dimension dim. filtrations must be sorted in order of dimension, each filtrations\mbox{[}i\mbox{]} must be sorted in order of filtration\\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}
Primary constructor. Important Assumptions\+: 1) Boundary matrix has real coefficients stored as integers (but not mod 2!) 2) Boundary matrix dimensions agree with filtrations sizes 3) Length(filtrations) = Length(boundaries) + 1 \mbox{\Hypertarget{classpetls_1_1PersistentSheafLaplacian_ae9bd3794cb99a3d04fcedd7f4a7e68af}\label{classpetls_1_1PersistentSheafLaplacian_ae9bd3794cb99a3d04fcedd7f4a7e68af}}

{\footnotesize\ttfamily void petls\+::\+Persistent\+Sheaf\+Laplacian\+::set\+\_\+boundaries\+\_\+filtrations (\begin{DoxyParamCaption}\item[{std\+::vector$<$ Eigen\+::\+Sparse\+Matrix$<$ storage $>$$>$}]{boundaries,  }\item[{std\+::vector$<$ std\+::vector$<$ \mbox{\hyperlink{typedefs_8hpp_afc86493f3736a9d186d249149b2e5e22}{filtration\+\_\+type}} $>$$>$}]{filtrations }\end{DoxyParamCaption})\hspace{0.3cm}{\ttfamily [inline]}}

Set the boundaries and filtrations of a complex, particularly if the default constructor was called. 
\begin{DoxyParams}{Parameters}
{\em boundaries} & a vector of Eigen\+::\+Sparse\+Matrix of type int. Boundaries must be sorted in order of dimension. \\
\hline
{\em filtrations} & a vector of vector of filtrations. filtrations\mbox{[}dim\mbox{]} is a list of all filtrations of simplices in dimension dim. filtrations must be sorted in order of dimension, each filtrations\mbox{[}i\mbox{]} must be sorted in order of filtration. Important Assumptions\+: 1) Boundary matrix has real coefficients stored as integers (but not mod 2!), 2) Boundary matrix dimensions agree with filtrations sizes, 3) Length(filtrations) = Length(boundaries) + 1. \\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}

Write spectra to files.

for each dimension dim of the complex, files write \char`\"{}\{out\+\_\+prefix\}\+\_\+spectra\+\_\+\{dim\}.\+txt\char`\"{}. Each line of the file is a space-\/separated list of eigenvalues. Lines may be empty. Note the filtration values are not reported.

\hline
{\em out\+\_\+prefix} & Eigenvalues will be written to \char`\"{}\{out\+\_\+prefix\}\+\_\+spectra\+\_\+\{dim\}.\+txt\char`\"{} \\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}
